mapper.update:
update KQDS_ROOM
roomid = #{roomid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
starttime = #{starttime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
endtime = #{endtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
doctor = #{doctor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
nurse = #{nurse,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
usercode = #{usercode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createuser = #{createuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
organization = #{organization,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
isdelete = #{isdelete,jdbcType=INTEGER},
delreason = #{delreason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
delperson = #{delperson,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
zzxt = #{zzxt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ks = #{ks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
roomstatus = #{roomstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
askperson = #{askperson,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phasedoctor = #{phasedoctor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tooth = #{tooth,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where seq_id = #{seqId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update KQDS_ROOM set roomid = #{roomid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, starttime = #{starttime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, endtime = #{endtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, doctor = #{doctor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nurse = #{nurse,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, usercode = #{usercode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createuser = #{createuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, organization = #{organization,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, isdelete = #{isdelete,jdbcType=INTEGER}, delreason = #{delreason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, delperson = #{delperson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, zzxt = #{zzxt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ks = #{ks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, roomstatus = #{roomstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where seq_id = #{seqId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select * from KQDS_Room where 1=1
and (doctor = #{doctor} or nurse = #{doctor})
and usercode = #{usercode}
and ( (startTime <= #{starttime} AND endTime >= #{endtime}) OR (startTime <= #{starttime} AND endTime < #{endtime} and endTime > #{starttime}) OR (startTime >= #{starttime} AND endTime >= #{endtime} and startTime < #{endtime}) OR (startTime >= #{starttime} AND endTime <= #{endtime} ) )
and isdelete != 1

select count(1) from KQDS_Room r LEFT JOIN KQDS_UserDocument u on u.usercode = r.usercode where 1=1 and r.isdelete != '1'
and to_days(r.starttime) = to_days(now())
and datediff(day,r.starttime,getdate())=0
and (r.doctor in (${querytype}) or r.nurse in (${querytype}) or r.createuser in (${querytype}))
AND (u.username LIKE '%' + #{searchValue} + '%' OR u.PhoneNumber1 LIKE '%' + #{searchValue} + '%' OR u.PhoneNumber2 LIKE '%' + #{searchValue} + '%')
and r.organization = #{organization}
